plot: Two estranged brothers in their 70s attempt to settle their differences amidst petty squabbling and gunfire - even if it kills them.
title: Old Habits
plot_es: Two estranged brothers in their 70s attempt to settle their differences amidst petty squabbling and gunfire - even if it kills them.
plot_en: Two estranged brothers in their 70s attempt to settle their differences amidst petty squabbling and gunfire - even if it kills them.
